blogPost.excerpt: Buddio is a mental health app to help support with depression, stress, and anxiety. Developed by software developers and psychologists based on the principles of science-backed therapies.
blogPost.body: Buddio is a mental health app to help support with depression, stress, and anxiety. Developed by software developers and psychologists based on the principles of science-backed therapies.
blogPost.title: Buddio - Mental health for everyone
blogPost.author: Abid Masood

localize.description: Buddio是一款心理健康应用程序，可以帮助应对抑郁、压力和焦虑。由软件开发人员和心理学家根据科学支持疗法的原则开发。
Buddio是一款心理健康應用程序，可以幫助應對抑鬱、壓力和焦慮。由軟件開發人員和心理學家根據科學支持療法的原則開發。

previous.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! 😁 Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. 🙌
previous.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.

localize.description: 隐私政策和数据请求表应该很容易找到，但许多公司将它们隐藏在用户界面的深处。Privacy Hunt是一个简单、免费、众包的存储库，只需单击一次即可！😁找到一家公司，单击链接，然后回收您的数据。🙌
localize.tagline: 我们寻找数据请求表，这样您就可以回收您的数据。

localize.description: 隱私政策和數據請求表應該很容易找到，但許多公司將它們隱藏在用戶界面的深處。Privacy Hunt是一個簡單、免費、衆包的存儲庫，只需單擊一次即可！😁找到一家公司，單擊鏈接，然後回收您的數據。🙌
localize.tagline: 我們尋找數據請求表，這樣您就可以回收您的數據。
